```{r, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
library(bbplot)
library(dplyr)
library(themedee)
library(gapminder)

brasil <- gapminder %>% 
  dplyr::filter(country == "Brazil") %>% 
  select(year, renda_per_capta = gdpPercap)
```
